content: ever felt like what your life was missing is a 5 foot tall goose plush me too now you can make one for your very own with my free pattern join the goose army materials approx 4-5 skeins premier basix chenille yarn in white approx 200 yds premier basix chenille yarn in mustard/yellow blanket yarn in black for the eyes could use felt or safety eyes my eyes are 4cm/1 5 inches wide 6 5mm/k crochet hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers so much polyfil or stuffing material of choice i used some blanket yarn scraps and about 5 lbs of polyfil copyright 2023 virginia grace kelley *all rights reserved*
